DOC.criteria: Female age < 40 year No uterine ( fibroid , mullerian malformation ) , ovarian ( endometrioma ) adnexa ( hydrosalpinx ) abnormalities• Baseline FSH LH < 12 IU/l.Patients least one embryo transfer time Very high risk OHSS ( > 30 follicle > 12 mm day ovulation trigger ) . • Reduced ovarian reserve Fertilization failure Severe endocrinopathy Azoospermia
